```{r echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(jsonlite)
library(data.table)

d<- fromJSON(readLines("quadratic-polynomial-4-threshold-0.8.json"))

if (length(d$errorOverTime) == 0) {
  df<-bind_rows(
    data.frame(
      param = "hitRate",
      iter = seq(1, length(d$hitRate)),
      val = d$hitRate
    ),
    data.frame(
      param = "avgTime",
      iter = seq(1, length(d$avgTime)),
      val = d$avgTime
    ),
    data.frame(
      param = "avgSlowTime",
      iter = seq(1, length(d$avgSlowTime)),
      val = d$avgSlowTime
    )
  )
} else {
  df<-bind_rows(
    data.frame(
      param = "errorOverTime",
      iter = seq(1, length(d$errorOverTime)),
      val = d$errorOverTime
    ),
    data.frame(
      param = "hitRate",
      iter = seq(1, length(d$hitRate)),
      val = d$hitRate
    ),
    data.frame(
      param = "avgTime",
      iter = seq(1, length(d$avgTime)),
      val = d$avgTime
    ),
    data.frame(
      param = "avgSlowTime",
      iter = seq(1, length(d$avgSlowTime)),
      val = d$avgSlowTime
    ),
    data.frame(
      param = "avgCacheLookupTime",
      iter = seq(1, length(d$avgCacheLookupTime)),
      val = d$avgCacheLookupTime
    )
  )
}

df <- mutate(df, param = factor(param))
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
ggplot(df %>% filter(param%in%c('errorOverTime', 'hitRate')), 
       aes(x=iter,
           y=val))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()+
  xlab('"Iteration"')+
  facet_wrap(~param)

```

Left: The absolute error over time for cache hits only.
Right: The average hit rate over a window of 20 calls, starting with a particular call.

```{r echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
ggplot(df %>% filter(param%in%c('avgTime')), 
       aes(x=iter,
           y=val))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()+
  xlab('"Iteration"')+
  ylab('Running Time per iteration')+
  geom_hline(data = df %>% 
               filter(param%in%c("avgCacheLookupTime", "avgSlowTime")),
             aes(yintercept = val, linetype = param))
```

Average query time over a window of 20 calls, compared to global average of non-cached query (avgSlowTime) and average time of cache hits (avgCacheLookupTime).

```{r echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
dfObserved <- data.frame(input = d$observedInputs, 
                         output = d$observedOutputs)

dfPredicted <- data.frame(d$predictedOutputs) %>%
  dplyr::rename(input = X1, output = X2)
  
dfPredictedStDev <- aggregate(dfPredicted, list(input=dfPredicted$input), sd)

ggplot(data=dfObserved, mapping=aes(x=input, y=output)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(data=dfPredicted, color="blue") +
  geom_point(data=dfPredicted, color="green")
#  geom_point(data=dfPredictedStDev, color="red")
```

Predictions of the cache on evenly spaced data points, compared to real data

```{r echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
ggplot(data=dfPredictedStDev, mapping=aes(x=input, y=output)) +
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(color="red", span=0.7)
```

Standard deviation of samples at each prediction point.


```{r echo=FALSE, message=F, warning=F}
getIgnoreData <- function(file_name, nickname) {
  json <- fromJSON(readLines(file_name))
  d <- data.frame(
    iter = seq(1, length(json$args)),
    arg = json$args,
    hit = json$rawHitRate
  )
  # split into buckets of width 0.5
  d <- group_by(d, argBucket = floor(arg * 10), epoch=ceiling(iter/50))
  d <- summarise(d, hitRate = mean(hit, na.rm=TRUE))
  d <- mutate(d, label=nickname)
  
  return(d)
}

dIgnore <- bind_rows(
  getIgnoreData('quadratic-polynomial-4-threshold-0.2.json', '4, 0.2'),
  getIgnoreData('quadratic-polynomial-5-threshold-0.2.json', '5, 0.2'),
  getIgnoreData('quadratic-polynomial-4-threshold-0.5.json', '4, 0.5'),
  getIgnoreData('quadratic-polynomial-5-threshold-0.5.json', '5, 0.5'),
  getIgnoreData('quadratic-polynomial-4-threshold-0.8.json', '4, 0.8'),
  getIgnoreData('quadratic-polynomial-5-threshold-0.8.json', '5, 0.8')
)

ggplot(dIgnore,
       aes(x=argBucket,# make x-axis INPUT VALUE
           y=hitRate))+
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth()+
  xlab('Input value bucket')+
  ylab('Hit rate') +
  facet_grid(label~epoch)

```
